prices.long_description: Structural beam element in concrete, steel or wood. Includes formwork, reinforcement and concrete pouring.
Structural column element in concrete, steel or composite. Includes formwork, reinforcement, concrete and finishes.
Foundation footing element. Includes excavation, lean concrete, reinforcement, concrete and waterproofing.
Deep foundation pile element. Includes drilling, reinforcement cage and concrete filling.
Accessibility ramp structure. Includes concrete base, reinforcement, surface finishing and handrails.
Staircase unit including structure, steps, risers, handrails and surface finishes.
Masonry wall construction. Includes brickwork or blockwork, mortar, insulation and plaster finishes on both sides.
Standard masonry wall with standard layers. Includes structural blocks, thermal insulation and interior/exterior finishes.
Concrete slab construction. Includes formwork, reinforcement mesh, concrete pouring and surface finishing.
Roof structure and covering system. Includes structural layer, thermal insulation, waterproofing membrane and protective layer.
Floor or ceiling covering installation. Includes base preparation, adhesive, covering material and finishing joints.
Door unit including frame, door leaf, hinges, lock, handles and finishes. Installation and adjustment included.
Window unit with frame, glazing, opening mechanism, weatherstripping and hardware. Installation and sealing included.
Pipe or duct segment for fluid distribution systems. Includes material, fittings, supports and installation.
Pipe or duct fitting element (elbow, tee, reducer, etc.). Includes material, gaskets and installation.
Terminal device for HVAC or plumbing systems (diffuser, outlet, tap, etc.). Includes device, connections and commissioning.
General distribution system element. Includes component, accessories, supports and installation work.
Railing or guardrail system. Includes posts, handrail, infill panels, anchors and surface treatment.
Built-in furnishing element. Includes manufacturing, finishing, hardware, delivery and installation.
Furniture unit or piece. Includes product, assembly, adjustment and placement in final position.
